casebody.data:
Basista Holdings, L.L.C.
v.
Ellsworth Twp. 2018-0187 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Motion to consolidate with 2018-0185, Kurilla v. Basista Holdings , denied as moot. Kennedy, J., dissents and would accept the appeal. Fischer, J., dissents.

DeGenaro, J., not participating.
